## 1. Random number generator in R.


```{r}
runif(10)
rbinom(10,1,0.5)
set.seed(12345)
runif(10)
rbinom(10,1,0.5)
set.seed(12345)
runif(10)
rbinom(10,1,0.5)
```

## 2. Random number generator in Rcpp.

```{Rcpp}
#include <Rcpp.h>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace Rcpp;
// [[Rcpp::export]]
void foo() {
  // create a vector of random numbers and print
  NumericVector x = runif(10);
  for(int i=0; i < 10; ++i) printf("%.5lf ",x[i]);
  printf("\n");
  NumericVector y = rbinom(10,1,0.5);
  for(int i=0; i < 10; ++i) printf("%d ",(int)y[i]);
  printf("\n");
  // create a single random number and print
  printf("%.5lf\n", R::runif(0,1));
  printf("%d\n",(int)R::rbinom(1,0.5));
}
```

```{r}
foo()
set.seed(12345)
foo()
set.seed(12345)
foo()
```
